name: One Script Jam - Untitled Arena Game
name_original: One Script Jam - Untitled Arena Game
description:
This game was entirely made using only a single script file for the One Script Jam held in 2019. It currently has no title. The theme of the jam was 'Leave something behind'.

The idea of the game is to select two of the three available items and enter the area. Kill the target amount of enemies to make it past each round - extra kills each round contribute to your score. Beat the boss in round 5 to win the game.

Controls

A & D - Left & right
Spacebar - Jump
1 & 2 - Use Items
LMB - Attach
R - Restart (when prompted)
Esc - Quit

Credits

Joshua Ferguson (Programming, Environment Art)
Jeremy Farrugia (Character Art)
Ashley Johnson (UI Art)
